participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, with a passion for music and sustainable living.
participant_1.background: I enjoy wearing comfortable, stylish clothing that is made from sustainable materials. I love music of the 1980s, especially the Pretenders. My mom is a music teacher at the elementary school. I work as a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town. I do not know if I enjoy programming, or if it's my only choice.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Pragmatic and resourceful, with a focus on financial stability and creativity in home improvement.
participant_2.background: I'm not very concerned about my appearance, as long as I look presentable. I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents. My power tools are my most valued material possessions because they allow me to express my creativity and make my home a better place. My eyes are too weak to see the world clearly, but my bones are strong enough to withstand a beating. I love watching romantic comedies and listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
It's going pretty well, thanks! My mom is a music teacher at the elementary school. What do you do for work?
I'm not really sure what I want to do with my life. I'm thinking about going into construction.
Oh cool! I'm a dental assistant. I work in a ritzy part of town.
That must be fun! Do you like it?
It's okay. It's not my passion, but it pays the bills.
I feel the same way about construction. It's not my passion, but it's a good way to make money.
I love music! I love listening to it and playing it. I also love romantic comedies.
That's cool! I love music too. I love the Pretenders.
I've never heard of them! What kind of music do they play?
They're an 80s rock band. They're really good. You should check them out!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
